title: Slow Metabolism
data:
{| cellpadding="4" cellspacing="0" border="1" |- style="font-style:italic;" |Rank||Effect||Flavor |- |1||Base nutrition consumption -1||You have a slow metabolism. |- |2||Base nutrition consumption -2||You need consume almost no food. |- | colspan="3" | Excludes [[Regeneration (mutation)]].
Removed along with [[food]] in [[0.26]]. |- | colspan="3" | '''Species notes:''' [[Felid]]s and [[Naga]]s start at rank 1, [[spriggan]]s start at rank 2. |- style="font-style:italic;" | colspan="3" | [[Good_mutations|Good mutation]] |} [[Category:Mutations]] [[Category:Good Mutations]]
